Name: Go
Description: go <direction>: go in the specified direction.  Also, g <direction> or just <direction>

Name: Get
Description: get <item>: pick up the specified item.  Also, take <item>  or t <item>

Name: Drop
Description: drop <item>: put down the specified item.  Also, dr <item>

Name: Quit
Description: quit: quit the game.  Also Q

Name: Save
Description: save <name>: save the game under the specified name

Name: Load
Description: load <name>: load the previously-saved game having the specified name

Name: Examine
Description: examine <entity>: describe the entity.  Also ex <entity> or look <entity> or l <entity> If no entity specified, describe the current room

Name: Help
Description: help <entity>: show a help message for a command or other entity.  If command is missing, show general help
